body.p: Hart County farmer. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth L. Wright in 1833. Married Martha A. S. Dawson. Father of Drury T. Dawson, Miles H. Dawson, John W. Dawson, Martha M. Dawson, and Ransom A. Dawson Jr. Held eight slaves in 1860.
